A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching this I have to wonder if Rian Johnson has ever even seen a Star Wars film before? I don’t even have a lot of faith in episode VX based on what Johnson left Abrams to work with. It’s like he intentionally went out of his way to destroy the very essence of what made the Star Wars universe so special. He made the “old guard” hero’s look inept and weak. And I get it’s more of a “passing the torch” type of film but the portrayal of Luke was horrible. Just a huge let down.
